title: The Drew Estate Cigar Connection
itunes:title: The Drew Estate Cigar Connection
description: The Drew Estate Cigar Connection! This week on The Cigar Authority we open up an original box of Nosotros Illusione Cigars by Drew Estate, and and an 11 year old box of Red Lion By Heaven Cigars and Drew Estate. We reveal the hottest thing to happen to a cigar... EVER, and LOTS more on this weeks edition of The Cigar Authority!
